m_Description: No one truly knows what happens on bussy farms....
What happens on Bussy Farms stays on Bussy Farms
People leaving their shelters encountered a brand new world - A much more dangerous and lawless world.
We trust you will be a great asset to The Company.
No one knows what happened to Doomsday Clock scientists after the asteroids hit the planet. Some suspect that they went into hidding, others belive they all died.
Doomsday Clock Scientists worked trying to stop the impact. The groups haven't been seen together since the Shelter in Place order
In 2018, astronomers discovered an asteroid with a 90-92% chance of impacting Earth, setting off a global crisis.
Despite efforts to keep the asteroid a secret, a leak in 2018 caused mass panic as the world learned of its potential impact.
The Doomsday Clock team, formed by major powers, worked tirelessly from 2018 to 2021 to find a solution to prevent the asteroid impact.
By 2020, the only feasible plan to save Earth was to send a manned shuttle with nuclear warheads to intercept the asteroid.
In 2021, a heroic mission launched a shuttle carrying nuclear warheads to destroy the asteroid as it passed by the Moon.
The asteroid was shattered into smaller pieces in 2021, reducing the impact but still causing widespread devastation.
After the asteroid's impact, humanity spent six weeks in shelters before emerging into a drastically changed world.
Three months after the exiting the shelters, survivors faced a world in chaos, with societal breakdown and rabid monsters.
